issue.title: Google layers doesn't work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

An OpenLayers 2.13.1 bug disable ability to show TERRAIN, HYBRID and ROADMAP google layers :
https://github.com/openlayers/ol2/issues/1450#issuecomment-146207698

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Check if possible to add here with other overrides: https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/entry/branches/4.4.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/libraries/easysdi/js/OpenLayers/override-openlayers.js

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Thanks Thomas to add the fix to easySDI.

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Ok this is done
